mapper.select: SELECT p.id as id, p.name as name, price, image_url, sold, view, p.is_deleted, b.id as b_id, b.name as b_name FROM product p JOIN brand b ON p.brand_id = b.id JOIN product_category pc ON p.id = pc.product_id WHERE pc.category_id = #{categoryId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_category WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND category_id = #{categoryId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM product_category WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND category_id = #{categoryId}
